item.title: Python for Freshers: Top 14 Beginner-Friendly Libraries You Should Master
item.description: A comprehensive guide to 14 essential Python libraries that every beginner should master, complete with code examples and practical use cases.

item.title: Enhancing Book Recommendations with Jaccard Similarity: My Thesis Project
item.description: How I used Jaccard Similarity in my thesis project to build a personalized book recommendation system based on users' average ratings.
